DOC.brief_title: Comparison Peak Airway Pressure Gastric Insufflation Manual Ventilation Pressure-controlled Ventilation With Facemask During Anesthesia Induction Children
DOC.criteria: 1 . ASA physical status I II 2 . Those parent sign informed consent . 3 . Children schedule elective urologic surgery ( age 6 month 7 year ) 1 . Risk aspiration 2 . Oropharyngeal facial anomaly 3. history abdominal ( stomach ) surgery
